This application requires JDK 1.5 to work

==============
>java -version
==============
java version "1.5.0_04"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.5.0_04-b05)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.5.0_04-b05, mixed mode, sharing)

=============
>ant -version
=============
Apache Ant version 1.6.5 compiled on June 2 2005

================
build.properties
================
Make a copy of the file build.properties.sample and named build.properties
This file contains any customizable/overridable parameters for the
build.
